overview: Andrea is CEO & EVP and founder of WiTech. He has a strong technical and economic background in the Telecommunication Sector with a focus on broadband field (WiFi, WiMAX, 3G/HSPA, LTE, xDSL and FFTH). He started his career at Telecom Italia Labs in Turin, where he performed advanced Research & Development activities in mobile access networks, gaining some international patents on mobile broadband architectures. Andrea was Chairman of the Personal Broadband Observatory of ANFoV and is today a well-known and respected expert on technical and economic analyses for 3G/4G technologies; he has authored several articles and reports on the subject. Andrea is also CEO and EVP of Lagaria S.r.l.,WiTech’s majority shareholder, President of Family Fund 4Gi S.r.l, and Board member in some start-up initiatives. He thanks as his technical and technological background implements a leadership for products development and consulting and engineering services related of key customers. Andrea was the leader for more than 50 projects about wireless next generation networks and services (WiFi, 3G/HSPA, WiMAX, LTE, Smart Metering) for different Telco Operators, System Integrators, Vendors and Consulting Firms in Inside Market and International Arena. Andrea earned a Degree in Telecommunications Engineering (Summa Cum Laude) from the University of Pisa, Italy.
